text: Begendyatska Pastil (Ukrainian: Бегендяцька Пастіль, Hungarian: Alsópásztély or Begengyátpásztély) is a village in Zakarpattia Oblast, Ukraine. Its population in 2001 was 190 people, 99.07% were Ukrainian and 0.97% were Russian. Category:Settlements of Uzhhorod District Category:Villages in Ukraine
title: Begendyatska Pastil
